meta_description: Discover the contemporary art & craft of the Puget Sound Region
hours_text:
## Admission

We offer free admission all year long thanks to Donors & Members like you!

Please note: Some special events require tickets.

## Location

[ 550 Winslow Way E.  
Bainbridge Island, WA 98110  
](http://web.archive.org/web/20251113163640/https://www.google.com/maps/dir//Bainbridge+Island+Museum+of+Art,+550+Winslow+Way+E,+Bainbridge+Island,+WA+98110/)

## Hours

Daily - 10am-5pm

### Bistro Hours

Daily - 10am-4pm

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility

# Accessibility

BIMA continues to work to make its programs, projects, and spaces accessible and enjoyable to all.

  * The museum is open 7 days a week, 361 days a year.
  * The galleries are free of admission. Over 90% of its programs, tours, lectures, festivals, and artist events are free. Several need-based scholarships are available for tuition-based programs, summer camps, and workshops.
  * All galleries, the Auditorium, the BIMA Bistro, the Museum Store, and all public spaces are wheelchair accessible.
  * Wheelchair seating is available for all Auditorium performances and presentations in the front and/or back of the Auditorium..
  * BIMA has 3 wheelchairs, 1 walker, and 1 cane available for guests to use while visiting the Museum.
  * The stage is accessible with a ramp for guest lecturers, performers, and artists, and the green room is wheelchair accessible. Steps to the stage include handrails.
  * The museum’s front doors and BIMA Bistro entry doors feature ADA electronic access buttons to activate doors opening from either side.
  * The Museum’s reception desk includes a counter at a height to accommodate wheelchairs.
  * A ramp leads from the elevator in the parking garage to the inside of the museum and features wall-mounted handrails.
  * BIMA’s plaza, parking, elevators, restrooms, backstage spaces, archives, and administrative offices are also 100% wheelchair accessible. The parking garage includes an underground drop-off area and a marked...

## [_Chris Maynard: Featherfolio Encore_ Following his popular exhibition at BIMA, Chris Maynard is back with a new exhibition. On view now ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106182031/https://www.biartmuseum.org/exhibitions/chris-maynard-featherfolio-encore/) ## [New Solo Exhibition On View Now _Aisha Harrison: Porous Body_ , open November 22 to February 22. Explore the exhibition  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106182031/https://www.biartmuseum.org/exhibitions/aisha-harrison-porous-body/) ## [_Denise Harrison: Winter Rails and Tales_ Experience a winter wonderland--all in miniature! Explore the exhibition ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106182031/https://www.biartmuseum.org/exhibitions/denise-harris-winter-rails-and-tales/) ## [_Truths and Memories_ on view now! BIMA's new exhibition explores memory & learning from the past. Explore ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106182031/https://www.biartmuseum.org/exhibitions/truths-and-memories/) ## [The permanent collection, unveiled like never before Explore _Reflecting on Collecting_ , on view now!  LEARN MORE ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106182031/https://www.biartmuseum.org/exhibitions/reflecting-on-collecting/)
